short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your battery should be between 40 and 80% if lithium, and never long charge (Max 50%)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app warn you when your lithium battery (more or less 80% of today's batteries) is below the 40% line, or upper than 80%. It allow you to preserve your battery
